dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.
dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
text-unidecode is the most basic port of the Text::Unidecode Perl
library.
dependencies.name: py-text-unidecode

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Synthetic Data Vault (SDV) is a Synthetic Data Generation ecosystem
of libraries that allows users to easily learn single-table, multi-table
and timeseries datasets to later on generate new Synthetic Data that has
the same format and statistical properties as the original dataset.
dependent_to.name: py-sdv

description:
Faker is a Python package that generates fake data for you. Whether you
need to bootstrap your database, create good-looking XML documents,
fill-in your persistence to stress test it, or anonymize data taken from
a production service, Faker is for you.
name: py-faker

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
